headline: GAIL (-0.18%) :  Company Management Anticipate PBT of ₹4,000-5,000 Crore in Gas Marketing, While Lowering FY26 Transmission Volume Guidance to 123-124 MMSCMD Due to Pipeline Issues and Lower Demand 📉🛢️ -Concall Updates

Godrej Consumer Products (+0.49%) :  Co Forecasts High Single Digit Growth For India Business And Consolidated Revenue For FY26. For The Second Half Of FY26, Indian Business Margins Expected To Be At The Lower End Of 24-26% Range, With Full Year Expectations Of Double-Digit EBITDA Growth For Indian And GOM Businesses. 📈💼 -Concall Updates

Vedanta (-2.64%) :  Company Management Aims for Over $6 Billion Annual EBITDA in FY26, Setting New Records. They Are Also Confident of Finalizing Their Demerger by the End of This Fiscal Year. 📈💰 -Concall Updates
Kalpataru Projects International (-0.48%) :  Co Predicts 25% Revenue Increase For FY26, Up From 20% Guidance; Aims For ₹25,000 Crore Order Inflow By Year-End 💼📈
